Our Purpose

Find & Promote Talent

CDiscovering and elevating emerging artists across various creative fields.

Youth Empowerment

Equipping young individuals with skills and opportunities for self-expression.

Create Employment

Generating job opportunities within the creative and entertainment industries.

Skill Acquisition & Training

Providing hands-on education to develop diverse artistic and technical talents.

Music & Film Production

Cultivating musical and cinematic artists through professional development and production.

Business Incubation Hub

Nurturing creative entrepreneurs with resources and mentorship for growth.

Spotlight Talent Hunt reality TV Show

An innovative reality TV show poised to transform Nigeria's creative landscape. This project tackles critical issues like youth unemployment and skill gaps, acting as a powerful catalyst for socio-economic development. By actively identifying and promoting raw talent, Spotlight Talent Hunt directly creates employment opportunities, empowering young Nigerians to become self-reliant entrepreneurs.

Spotlight Talent Hunt

Transformative initiative designed to discover, nurture, and empower young Nigerians across multiple fields, including technology, entrepreneurship, vocational skills, and the creative arts

Each contestant will undergo an intensive boot camp, mentorship program, and practical skill-building sessions, enabling them to thrive in the competitive job market.

  • Music, Acting, dance, Comedy, drawing/painting
  • Fashion, sculpture, animation, Make up Artistry.
  • Robotics & Artificial Intelligence
  • Alternative Energy
  • Culinary Arts

Our Unique Value .

The Nigerian creative industry is projected to reach $14.8 billion by 2025 and create an additional 2.7 million jobs. we are a major contributor, transforming raw talent into skilled professionals ready to capitalize on this growth.

We don't just identify stars; we build sustainable careers, ensuring participants are equipped for long-term success and contribute meaningfully to Nigeria's booming creative economy.

  • Boost Annual Employment Rate By

  • Annual Skill Training Target

  • Training Hubs Establishment

What you should Know.

Here are few things we thought might be of concern to you and we have provided some clarification below

The show is open to talented individuals across various age groups. Specific age requirements for different categories will be detailed in the application guidelines.

Applications will be accepted online through our official website. Details on the application process, required materials (like video submissions), and deadlines will be clearly provided.

Judges will assess participants on originality, technical skill, stage presence, creativity, storytelling ability, and overall entertainment value, ensuring a holistic evaluation of talent.

Winners receive a comprehensive prize package including cash, professional mentorship, recording contracts, film production opportunities, and extensive industry exposure to launch their careers.

No prior professional experience is strictly required. We are looking for raw talent and potential, providing a platform for individuals to develop their skills and make their mark.

All participants gain invaluable exposure, professional training, networking opportunities with industry experts, and a significant boost to their creative journey, regardless of winning.
